00677     class _OgreExport MaterialPtr : public SharedPtr<Material> 
00678     {
00679     public:
00680         MaterialPtr() : SharedPtr<Material>() {}
00681         explicit MaterialPtr(Material* rep) : SharedPtr<Material>(rep) {}
00682         MaterialPtr(const MaterialPtr& r) : SharedPtr<Material>(r) {} 
00683         MaterialPtr(const ResourcePtr& r) : SharedPtr<Material>()
00684         {
00685             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00686             OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00687             {
00688                 OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00689                 OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00690                 pRep = static_cast<Material*>(r.getPointer());
00691                 pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00692                 if (pUseCount)
00693                 {
00694                     ++(*pUseCount);
00695                 }
00696             }
00697         }
00698 
00700         MaterialPtr& operator=(const ResourcePtr& r)
00701         {
00702             if (pRep == static_cast<Material*>(r.getPointer()))
00703                 return *this;
00704             release();
00705             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00706             OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00707             {
00708                 OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00709                 OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00710                 pRep = static_cast<Material*>(r.getPointer());
00711                 pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00712                 if (pUseCount)
00713                 {
00714                     ++(*pUseCount);
00715                 }
00716             }
00717             else
00718             {
00719                 // RHS must be a null pointer
00720                 assert(r.isNull() && "RHS must be null if it has no mutex!");
00721                 setNull();
00722             }
00723             return *this;
00724         }
00725     };
